metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20352 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Netwide Assembler (NASM) 2.15rc0, a heap-based buffer over-read occurs (via a crafted .asm file) in set_text_free when called from expand_one_smacro in asm/preproc.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-20352` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

nasm - 2.15.04-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nasm package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.15.04-1').
